comment:
* Util class to get feature flag information.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_DO_NOT_RESTORE_PRESERVED
variables.comment: @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_USE_NEW_BACKUP_ELIGIBILITY_RULES
variables.comment: @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_ENABLE_SECURITY_HUB
variables.comment: @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_SUPPORT_LARGE_SCREEN
variables.comment: @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_APP_LOCALE_OPT_IN_ENABLED
variables.comment:
* Support locale opt-out and opt-in switch for per app's language.
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_VOLUME_PANEL_IN_SYSTEMUI
variables.comment:
* Launch the Volume panel in SystemUI.
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_ENABLE_MONITOR_PHANTOM_PROCS
variables.comment: @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_APP_ALLOW_DARK_THEME_ACTIVATION_AT_BEDTIME
variables.comment:
* Support dark theme activation at Bedtime.
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_NEED_CONNECTED_BLE_DEVICE_FOR_BROADCAST
variables.comment:
* Flag to decouple bluetooth LE Audio Broadcast from Unicast
     * If the flag is true, the broadcast feature will be enabled when the phone
     * is connected to the BLE device.
     * If the flag is false, it is not necessary to connect the BLE device.
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_NEW_KEYBOARD_MODIFIER_KEY
variables.comment:
* Enable new modifier key settings UI
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_NEW_KEYBOARD_TRACKPAD
variables.comment:
* Enable new trackpad settings UI
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_NEW_KEYBOARD_TRACKPAD_GESTURE
variables.comment:
* Enable trackpad gesture settings UI
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_ENABLE_SPA
variables.comment:
* Enable the new pages which is implemented with SPA.
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_ENABLE_SPA_PHASE2
variables.comment:
* Enable new pages implemented with SPA besides the SPA pages controlled by the {@code
     * settings_enable_spa} flag.
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_ENABLE_SPA_METRICS
variables.comment:
* Enable the SPA metrics writing.
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_ADB_METRICS_WRITER
variables.comment:
Flag to enable/disable adb log metrics
     *  @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_SHOW_STYLUS_PREFERENCES
variables.comment:
* Flag to show stylus-specific preferences in Connected Devices
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_BIOMETRICS2_ENROLLMENT
variables.comment:
* Flag to enable/disable biometrics enrollment v2
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_BIOMETRICS2_FINGERPRINT_SETTINGS
variables.comment:
* Flag to enable/disable FingerprintSettings v2
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_REMOTEAUTH_ENROLLMENT_SETTINGS
variables.comment:
* Flag to enable/disable remote auth enrollment and settings
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_PREFER_ACCESSIBILITY_MENU_IN_SYSTEM
variables.comment:
* Flag to enable/disable preferring the AccessibilityMenu service in the system.
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_AUDIO_ROUTING
variables.comment:
Flag to enable/disable audio routing change
     *  @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_FLASH_NOTIFICATIONS
variables.comment:
Flag to enable/disable flash notifications
     *  @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_ENABLE_LOCKSCREEN_TRANSFER_API
variables.comment:
* Flag to enable lock screen credentials transfer API in Android U.
     * @hide

variables.name: SETTINGS_REMOTE_DEVICE_CREDENTIAL_VALIDATION
variables.comment:
* Flag to enable remote device credential validation
     * @hide

methods.name: public static boolean isEnabled(Context context, String feature)
methods.comment:
* Whether or not a flag is enabled.
     *
     * @param feature the flag name
     * @return true if the flag is enabled (either by default in system, or override by user)

methods.name: public static void setEnabled(Context context, String feature, boolean enabled)
methods.comment: * Override feature flag to new state.

methods.name: public static Map<String, String> getAllFeatureFlags()
methods.comment: * Returns all feature flags in their raw form.

methodNames: public static boolean isEnabled(Context context, String feature)
public static void setEnabled(Context context, String feature, boolean enabled)
